# Slider Indicator

## Usage:

```html
<p-slider-indicator />
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                           | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `active` | `active`  | Wether the slider indicator is active | `boolean` | `false` |
